CrowdsaleExt.getState (/unique_chucks/30/0xc304fb0d2def2c934fdf76a9dff11f4c9a469dad.sol#845-873) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/30/0xc304fb0d2def2c934fdf76a9dff11f4c9a469dad.sol#869-873)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/30/0xc304fb0d2def2c934fdf76a9dff11f4c9a469dad.sol#866-873)
